name: A Lonely Path Through the Forest
description: You're on a lonely dirt path through the dense forest. The path is slowly being overgrown due to disuse. You can hear birds and other forest critters somewhere in the trees. A cloud of insects buzzes around, searching for prey. The path heads east and west.

features.look: You can see a couple birds sitting in branches but the rest are too stealthy.
They're sparrows... or are they starlings? You never were a bird lover so you're not sure.
It's a dirt path, slowly being overtaken by encroaching weeds. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time.
